manufacturing.title: Smart Dashboard - Industry / Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Enhance production efficiency through real-time energy and KPI monitoring, reduce 20-30% costs through operational optimization, improve safety and move towards green industry, net-zero.

introduction.paragraph1: In the context of the {industryRevolution}, manufacturing and industrial parks are at the epicenter of a profound and comprehensive transformation. Factories are no longer merely assembly sites, but have become {dataMining} due to the explosion of IoT devices, smart sensors, and automation systems.
introduction.paragraph2: Data is now likened to {newOil}, becoming strategic assets and the lifeblood that sustains all operations of a {smartFactory}.
introduction.paragraph3: {smartIndustrialPark} is a further step forward, applying Smart Factory principles on a park-wide scale, managing in an integrated manner from infrastructure, production, energy, environment to security and logistics.

challenges.title: Real Challenges of Industrial Parks & Factories
challenges.subtitle: Having massive data but unable to exploit it effectively turns potential into burden. Factories and industrial parks face systematic barriers.

items.title: Fragmented Data and "Information Silos" (Data Silos)
items.description: This is the top challenge. Data from OT systems (SCADA, PLC) and IT systems (ERP, MES) are usually managed by different departments and don't "talk" to each other.
items.example: The maintenance team views machine vibration data on CMMS, production team monitors output on MES, and facility management tracks energy consumption of the same machine on BMS. The result is no one has a comprehensive view, leading to delayed and ineffective decisions.

items.title: Integration Difficulties and Lack of Standardization
items.description: Connecting a 20-year-old CNC lathe with a modern IoT sensor requires complex and expensive protocol conversion solutions due to diversity in vendors and technologies.

items.title: Poor Data Quality
items.description: Decision quality depends on input data quality. Issues include: missing data due to network connection errors, inaccuracy due to miscalibrated sensors, or inconsistency due to manual data entry.

items.title: Dependence on "Individual Experts" and Lack of Predictive Capability
items.description: When an experienced machinist retires, an entire repository of knowledge about machinery and processes disappears. This creates dangerous "knowledge gaps".

items.title: High Maintenance Costs and Unpredictable Downtime
items.description: Current preventive maintenance models are often either too conservative (wasteful costs) or too lax (causing unexpected failures).

applications.title: Detailed Applications of Smart Dashboard in Practice
applications.subtitle: Smart Dashboard serves as the 'command center' or 'digital brain' of factories and industrial parks, thoroughly solving the above challenges.

strategicBenefits.title: Strategic and Quantitative Benefits
strategicBenefits.subtitle: Implementing Smart Dashboard is not just a technology upgrade, but a strategic decision that brings outstanding and measurable business results.

features.title: 20-30% Cost Reduction
features.description: Optimize production processes and efficient resource management, minimize waste.

features.title: Real-time Energy Monitoring
features.description: Monitor and adjust energy consumption of each machine and production line.

features.title: Towards Net-Zero
features.description: Achieve zero carbon emission goals through environmental monitoring and energy optimization.

cta.title: Digital transformation for your factory
cta.subtitle: Start the journey towards Industry 4.0 and Net-Zero

building.title: Smart Dashboard - Smart Building
building.description: Smart building management solution with 30-40% energy savings, enhanced security, and complete automation management.

introduction.paragraph1: In the era of Industry 4.0, {smartBuilding} is not just a trend but has become the new standard for modern constructions. The integration of IoT, AI, and automated management systems helps optimize operational efficiency, save costs, and enhance user experience.
introduction.paragraph2: Smart Dashboard acts as the "central brain" of the building, connecting and controlling all systems from HVAC, lighting, security to energy management in a unified and intelligent manner.

challenges.title: Challenges in traditional building management
challenges.subtitle: Traditional buildings often face operational efficiency and management issues:

items.title: Serious energy waste
items.description: HVAC and lighting systems operate inefficiently, consuming unnecessary energy even when not in use.

items.title: Complex manual management
items.description: Requires multiple personnel to monitor and adjust different systems, prone to errors and slow response.

items.title: Lack of operational transparency
items.description: No comprehensive view of building performance, making it difficult to detect and resolve issues.

items.title: High maintenance costs
items.description: Scheduled maintenance instead of condition-based maintenance leads to unnecessary costs and risk of unexpected failures.

features.title: 30-40% Energy Savings
features.description: Optimize HVAC, lighting and air conditioning systems through intelligent AI and IoT.

features.title: Enhanced Safety & Security
features.description: 24/7 security monitoring, automated access control and early detection of potential risks.

features.title: Automation Management
features.description: Smart control of building systems, minimizing manual intervention and optimizing operations.

benefits: Minimize carbon footprint and environmental friendliness

cta.title: Transform your building into a Smart Building
cta.subtitle: Let us help you save costs and improve operational efficiency

seaport.title: Smart Dashboard - Smart Seaport
seaport.description: Smart seaport management solution with logistics optimization, 30% reduction in ship processing time, enhanced operational efficiency and 24/7 real-time safety monitoring.

introduction.paragraph1: In the context of increasingly developing global trade, {smartSeaport} has become a key factor in the international supply chain. The application of modern technology and {digitalization} helps seaports improve productivity, reduce costs and ensure safety.
introduction.paragraph2: Smart Dashboard acts as an intelligent control center, integrating all activities from ship management, containers, personnel to security and environment in a unified system.

challenges.title: Challenges in traditional seaport management
challenges.subtitle: Traditional seaports often face difficulties in optimizing operations:

items.title: Complex logistics management
items.description: Coordinating thousands of containers, trucks and port equipment without an integrated system leads to congestion and inefficiency.

items.title: Long ship processing time
items.description: Manual processes in inspection, loading/unloading and paperwork cause ships to berth longer, increasing operating costs.

items.title: Difficulty in safety monitoring
items.description: Port environment with many risks requires continuous monitoring but traditional systems cannot meet the requirements.

items.title: Lack of forecasting and planning
items.description: No real-time data to predict ship traffic and optimize port resources.

features.title: 30% reduction in ship processing time
features.description: Automate processes from docking to paperwork and cargo handling.

features.title: Optimize logistics and transportation
features.description: Smart management of containers, trucks and port equipment to increase overall efficiency.

features.title: 24/7 safety monitoring
features.description: Comprehensive monitoring system ensuring safety for port staff and assets.

benefits: Automate 80% of docking and paperwork processes
Real-time tracking of location and status of all containers
Accurate forecasting of ship traffic and resource planning
Minimize workplace accidents and cargo losses

cta.title: Modernize your seaport
cta.subtitle: Enhance operational efficiency and ensure safety with advanced technology
